title: Drawing, May 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream colored wove paper, darkened to brown and pieced along right edge.
markings:
Recto: Stamped in ink, at lower left: Museum of the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union Museum [Lugt 457c]
Verso: Stamped in ink, at center right: 457d
inscribed: Across bottom of sheet in graphite: Barranquilla - May - 53 / Calle de Commerce
description: An oblique view into the street, lined with thatch roofed buildings, with two children and a woman barely visible in the middle ground. Clouds are suggested by the brush strokes above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, May 1853.
May 1853. Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream colored wove paper, darkened to brown and pieced along right edge.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-57.
